response.original_title: Safety on Our School Bus (Second Edition)
response.overview: The film "Safety on the School Bus" features Homer, a friendly school bus, who teaches children about bus safety. Homer explains the various safety features he has, such as warning lights and stop arms, and emphasizes the importance of the bus driver, Tom, who conducts safety inspections and follows rules to ensure passenger safety. The film outlines key safety rules for students, including staying clear of the bus until it stops, keeping the aisle clear, and remaining seated while the bus is moving. It also highlights the significance of emergency preparedness through evacuation drills and encourages children to think and act safely.
